channel.title: CDC on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in CDC on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: RFK Jr. posted fishing pics as CDC reeled from shooting linked to vaccine disinfo
item.description: Anti-vaccine activist RFK Jr. has vilified COVID-19 vaccines and the CDC.

item.title: “Red meat allergy” from tick bites is spreading both in US and globally
item.description: Remember to check for ticks after your next stroll through the woods or long grasses.

item.title: CDC finally gets a director; FDA’s top vaccine regulator exits under pressure
item.description: Senate confirmed Susan Monarez to CDC while Vinay Prasad made a quick exit from FDA.

item.title: Senate confirms CDC director as top FDA official resigns under political pressure
item.description: Senate confirmed Susan Monarez to CDC while Vinay Prasad made a quick exit from FDA.

item.title: “It’s shocking”; Massive raw milk outbreak from 2023 finally reported
item.description: The outbreak occurred in 2023–2024, but little information had been shared about it.

item.title: Trump admin. is muffling CDC’s flagship health journal, report finds
item.description: CDC’s MMWR is publishing much less, and sources say studies now require RFK Jr.’s sign-off.

item.title: RFK Jr. wants to change program that stopped vaccine makers from leaving US market
item.description: RFK Jr. is targeting a little-known program that underpins childhood immunizations in the US.
